about.heroSubtitle: We strive to help Arab students achieve their academic dreams
about.missionText: We believe education is a right for everyone, and we work to facilitate access to global educational opportunities for Arab students by providing comprehensive and updated scholarship information.
about.storyText: Our journey began from our belief in the importance of education in changing the lives of individuals and communities. We are a team of graduates who benefited from scholarships and want to share these opportunities with others.

contact.heroSubtitle: We're happy to answer your questions and help you
contact.successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully!
contact.faq1A: Yes, all our services are completely free. We help students find scholarships without any fees.
contact.faq2Q: How can I apply for scholarships?
contact.faq2A: We provide comprehensive information about each scholarship with the official application link. Applications are submitted directly through the scholarship provider's website.
contact.faq3Q: Do you help with writing recommendation letters?
contact.faq3A: We provide guidelines and tips for writing applications, but we don't offer direct writing services.

turkey.heroSubtitle: Discover world-class education opportunities in Turkey with fully-funded scholarships and direct university enrollment
turkey.whySubtitle: Turkey offers exceptional educational opportunities for international students
turkey.why1Desc: Over 200 universities with internationally recognized programs and modern facilities
turkey.why2Desc: Lower cost of living compared to Europe and USA with high quality of life
turkey.why3Desc: Experience a unique blend of Eastern and Western cultures at the crossroads of continents
turkey.why4Desc: Access to one of the world's fastest-growing economies with career opportunities
turkey.scholarshipSubtitle: The most prestigious fully-funded scholarship program for international students
turkey.scholarshipDesc: Türkiye Burslari is the Turkish Government's flagship scholarship program offering fully-funded opportunities for Bachelor's, Master's, and PhD studies at top Turkish universities.
turkey.benefit2: Monthly stipend (Bachelor: 1,000 TL, Master: 1,400 TL, PhD: 1,800 TL)
turkey.eligibility1: Under 21 years for Bachelor's, under 30 for Master's, under 35 for PhD
turkey.eligibility2: Minimum 70% GPA for Bachelor's, 75% for Master's and PhD
turkey.enrollmentSubtitle: Apply directly to Turkish universities through various pathways
turkey.enrollmentDesc: International students can apply directly to Turkish universities through multiple entrance pathways including YÖS exam, SAT scores, or high school diploma.
turkey.yosDesc: The Foreign Student Exam (YÖS) is conducted by Turkish universities for international student admissions. Each university may have its own YÖS exam.
turkey.directDesc: Apply directly to universities using your high school diploma, SAT/ACT scores, or other internationally recognized certificates.
turkey.livingSubtitle: What to expect as a student in Turkey
turkey.living1Desc: University dormitories and affordable private housing options available
turkey.living2Desc: Discounted public transport for students with student ID cards
turkey.living3Desc: Rich Turkish cuisine and welcoming culture for international students
